latestmovies.name: Airlift
latestmovies.details: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

latestmovies.name: Azhar
latestmovies.details: Biographical sports drama based on the life of former Indian international cricketer, Mohammad Azharuddin

latestmovies.name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
latestmovies.details: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

latestmovies.name: Bajirao Mastani
latestmovies.details: An account of the romance between the Maratha general, Baji Rao I and Mastani, princess of Bundelkhand.

upcommingmovies.name: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
upcommingmovies.details: While recovering from an assassination attempt four days before his coronation, a stern prince is replaced by a romantic lookalike.

upcommingmovies.name: Baby
upcommingmovies.details: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

upcommingmovies.name: Baahubali: The Beginning
upcommingmovies.details: A child from the Mahishmati kingdom is raised by tribal people and one day learns about his royal heritage, his father's bravery in battle and a mission to overthrow the incumbent ruler.

upcommingmovies.name: Gabbar Is Back
upcommingmovies.details: After a vengeful college professor targets corruption in the government, he adopts the name 'Gabbar' and becomes a hero to a weary public.
